title: The Race of Truth Is a Lie: How Time Trial Setup Optimization Could Add Up to a 66-Watt Advantage in This Year’s Tour de France
content:
Time Trialing is just you against the clock. Well, you and a heavily optimized combination of cutting edge gear and bike positioning against the clock.

Read the full article at The Race of Truth Is a Lie: How Time Trial Setup Optimization Could Add Up to a 66-Watt Advantage in This Year’s Tour de France on Velo.
